data.name: help_message
data.value: Hello, I am CJTasksHelperBot. I will help you organize your tasks and homework. Some commands are executed in several steps, so you need to keep entering the necessary information or cancel the command. Some commands support command line arguments with checkboxes. For details, add the -h|--help flag to the command (separated by a space). This flag takes precedence over other flags, so others will be ignored. To interact with me, use the following commands: /help - show this help /add_task - add a task /stop - stop the current command

data.name: wrng_val_enter_again
data.value: An invalid value was entered. Please try again

data.name: enter_task_deadline
data.value: Enter the task deadline in the format `dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm` or `dd.MM.yyyy`

data.name: wrong_datetime_try_again
data.value: The date and time are incorrect. Please try again

data.name: err_creat_task_try_again
data.value: An error occurred while creating a task. Please try again

data.name: usage
data.value:
Usage:
/start - show available commands /get_current_user - get the name and surname of the current user /add_task - add a task

data.value: You need to enter the language code

data.value: Enter the language code. Available codes:

data.name: need_enter_task_name

data.value: The command is allowed only for group administrators
